item.title: Making Items Stackable
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Item class.

[code] try {
FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(
new File(“data/stackable.dat”));

        while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
            if (c == 0) {
                itemStackable[counter] = false;
            } else {
                itemStackable[counter] = true;
            }
            counter++;
        }
        dataIn.close();[/code]

Under dataIn.close(); you would put something like

                       itemStackable[6570] = false;

This is making the Item ID 6570 (Fire Cape) return false, so it will not be stackable. Just return it true if you want it to stack.

Read full topic
